content:
Where's the best place to ping someone about a possible corrupted file on the CMIP6 data stored in Google Cloud? Neil Swart and his grad student found that our fgco2 for just one of our experiments errors out with a buffer error when using that catalogue. The file if you download it from ESGF is fine. Here's an MWE:
https://github.com/swartn/canesm5_pangeo_issues/blob/main/canesm5_r1i1p1f1_pangeo_issue.ipynb

Where's the best place to ping someone about a possible corrupted file on the CMIP6 data stored in Google Cloud?

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeISi54dqekkknPp8IrBr-uioM2TGGiW7xGpW6Q_9-9WFlWTQ/viewform
